answers.hobbies: I host monthly dinner parties where strangers become friends over home-cooked meals. I'm also learning to play the cello (badly) and collect vintage maps from flea markets.
answers.study_work: The magic moment when a team clicks and achieves something none of them could have done alone. I love creating spaces where people feel safe to be vulnerable and innovative.
answers.mistake: I said yes to every opportunity for two years and burned out completely. It taught me that boundaries aren't selfishâ€”they're necessary for sustainable impact.
answers.beyond_title: A connector of people and ideas who believes in the power of intentional community
